description: This file defines a React functional component called Sidebar, which renders a vertical navigation panel with branding, a button for creating new notes, and a search input for filtering notes. It serves as a user interface element for note management within the larger application.

methods.name: Sidebar({ onNew, search, onSearchChange })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a sidebar with branding, a 'New Note' button, and a search input field. It accepts props for handling new note creation, search query state, and search input changes.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Sidebar({ onNew, search, onSearchChange }) {$/
